about_the_game:
This is the Digital Artbook of Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost.

Includes pdf files in 4 languages, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

How to access the Artbook

1. In the Steam library, right click on Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost and select "property".

2. In the property window, check that the DLC is installed.

3. In the Steam library, right click on Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost and hover over "Manage" and from the drop-down click "Browse local files."

4. File Explorer will open.

5. You should see the folder "Artbook" with the pdf files inside.

*The content of this Digital Artbook is the same as the "ARTWORKS" included the Nintendo Switch Physical Deluxe Edition "Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost Gensokyo Memorial Archive BOX"

and the "Artbook" within the "Digital Gallary & Music Player" included in the Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost Gensokyo Digital Memorial Archive.

Please check and be sure not to duplicate purchase.
